input_text:
Job Title: Solution Architect

Location: Overland Park, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
WellSky is seeking a Solution Architect to join our Professional Services team supporting WellSky’s HCS products.

As a Solution Architect, you will be responsible for leading the architecture, design, and development of our solution, working towards delivering reliable, efficient, high-quality software and hardware solutions.

A day in the life! 

You will be responsible for the following:

Lead the architecture, design, and development of our solutionWork with solution managers, and development to gather, analyze and translate requirements into deliverable solutionConsult with the sales force on technical matters, ensuring that proposed solutions can be integrated with current systemsMay perform sales presentations to prospective clientsDrive high-level client engagements through proactive identification of client cases resulting in overall business improvements for WellSky clients and our businessReview client technical needs and recommend specific solutions and/or services to meet those needsConsult with sales team, engineers, and implementation ensuring proposed solutions can be integrated with current systemsPartner with assigned clients to research and understand client specific workflows and requirements, and assist in the mapping of those requirements to software solution design and implementation configurations

Do you have what it takes? 

Required Experience: 

Bachelor’s degree in a related field4-6 years related work experience

Do you stand above the rest? 

Preferred Experience: 

Healthcare experience with home infusion or specialty pharmacy experience

Additional job expectations applicable to this position include:

Willingness to work additional or irregular hours as neededWorking in accordance with corporate and organizational security policies and proceduresPerforming other responsibilities as assigned

WellSky is where independent thinking and collaboration come together to create an authentic culture. We thrive on innovation, inclusiveness, and cohesive perspectives. At WellSky you can make a difference.

WellSky provides equal employment opportunities to all people without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, religion, gender, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, physical or mental disability, protected medical condition, genetic information, military service, veteran status, or any other status or characteristic protected by law. WellSky is proud to be a drug-free workplace.

Applicants for U.S.-based positions with WellSky must be legally authorized to work in the United States. Verification of employment eligibility will be required at the time of hire. Certain client-facing positions may be required to comply with applicable requirements, such as immunizations and occupational health mandates.

Here are some of the exciting benefits full-time teammates are eligible to receive at WellSky:

Excellent medical, dental, and vision benefitsMental health benefits through TelaDocPrescription drug coverageGenerous paid time off, plus 13 paid holidaysPaid parental leave100% vested 401(K) retirement plansEducational assistance up to $2500 per year

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Solution Architect
output_json.summary: WellSky seeks a Solution Architect for their Professional Services team.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in a related field
job_responsibilities: Lead the architecture, design, and development of the solution
Work with solution managers and development to gather, analyze, and translate requirements into deliverable solutions
Consult with the sales force on technical matters, ensuring that proposed solutions can be integrated with current systems
May perform sales presentations to prospective clients
Drive high-level client engagements through proactive identification of client cases resulting in overall business improvements for WellSky clients and the business
Review client technical needs and recommend specific solutions and/or services to meet those needs
Consult with sales team, engineers, and implementation ensuring proposed solutions can be integrated with current systems

Partner with assigned clients to research and understand client specific workflows and requirements, and assist in the mapping of those requirements to software solution design and implementation configurations
benefits: Excellent medical, dental, and vision benefits
Generous paid time off, plus 13 paid holidays
Educational assistance up to $2500 per year

WellSky is proud to be a drug-free workplace.
